motivation.title: Motivation
motivation.body: Skeet allows you to get your app up and running quickly and maintain it for the long term at a low cost.

quickstart.title: Quickstart
quickstart.body: Describes the setup for getting started with the Skeet framework.

tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.body: This tutorial will create an OpenAI Chat App using Skeet Framework.

initial-deploy.title: Initial Deploy
initial-deploy.body: You can learn how to publish your Skeet app. You can also set deploy for each Commit with GitHub Actions with a single command.

basic-architecture.title: Basic Architecture
basic-architecture.body: Describes the basic structure of the Skeet framework. Each directory of the application and each command of CLI are explained.

skeet-firestore.title: Firestore Plugin
skeet-firestore.body: How to use type-safe Firestore in Skeet Framework.

react-native.title: React Native (Expo)
react-native.body: We're using React Native (Expo) on the frontend. We can use npm packages like the Tailwind on mobile dev as well.

ssg-template.title: SSG Template (Next.js)
ssg-template.body: The project needs the website, blog and docs. So we have the boilerplate for that with SSG on Next.js. SEO Ready.
